titleStmt.title: The grand indictment of high-treason. Exhibited aginst the Marquess of Argyle, by His Maiesties Advocate. To the Parliament of Scotland. With the Marquesses answers. And the proceedings thereupon.
The grand indictment of high-treason. Exhibited aginst the Marquess of Argyle, by His Maiesties Advocate. To the Parliament of Scotland. With the Marquesses answers. And the proceedings thereupon.
titleStmt.author: Argyll, Archibald Campbell, Marquis of, 1598-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the satisfaction of all those that desire to know the truth,

notesStmt.note: Numerous errors in pagination; text continuous.
'The Marquess of Argyle his petition to the Parliament of Scotland' has its own title page.
Annotations on Thomason copies: Thomason E.1087[1]: "Aprill 10"; Thomason E.1087[2]: "Aprill 10".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: the satisfaction of all those that desire to know the truth
